front.title: DHCPv6 and CGA Interaction: Problem Statement

abstract.t: This document presents a problem statement for the possible interactions between DHCPv6 and CGA. Firstly, in order to support the co-existing scenarios of DHCPv6 and CGA, Some operations are clarified for the interaction of DHCPv6 servers and CGA-associated hosts. Then, some extended scenarios are also discussed in this document, including using CGAs in DHCPv6 operations to enhance the security features and using DHCPv6 to serve the CGA generation.
